backend/main.mo: Main canister logic with access control, user profile storage, cycle diagnostics, CoinGecko URL builder, and live market data outcall with cycle safety checks.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that forwards the old user profile map structure unchanged into the new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to file paths, components, and test IDs for cycle diagnostics UI and improved error messaging.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of major frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and integration with backend features.
frontend/docs/coingecko-debug-dfx.md: Developer instructions for deploying and testing raw CoinGecko API responses using a debug function via dfx.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling identity bootstrapping, routing between dashboard and backend tester, profile setup detection, and global query provider setup.
Dialog UI for adding cryptocurrencies that currently displays a placeholder notice indicating backend crypto functionality is not implemented.
frontend/src/components/BackendTesterEnt: Entry component for the Backend Tester with admin checks, loading/error handling, and navigation including limited mode for non-admins.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorBound: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionBootst: Manages authentication and backend-actor initialization flow, handling timeouts, retries, and error UI before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionDetail: Provides an expandable debug panel showing connection state details with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionRecove: Empty placeholder file for a future connection‑recovery dialog component.
frontend/src/components/CryptoCard.tsx: Displays live crypto market data with error handling and opens a detail dialog for deeper analysis.
frontend/src/components/CryptoDetailDial: Modal dialog showing forecast charts and settings for a selected cryptocurrency.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with attribution and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Generates simulated historical price data and computes moving averages and regression-based forecasts for charting.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSettings: UI panel for adjusting moving‑average period and forecast horizon using sliders.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component handling theme toggling, Internet Identity auth, user registration, and optional navigation to backend tester.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays marketing-style feature cards and a login button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/PriceEntryManage: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the authenticated user to enter a name and save their profile via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedBashPan: Simulated terminal UI for running backend commands with reconnection logic, admin checks, and scroll-managed output.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistManager: Watchlist management UI stub showing a placeholder alert and button to add cryptocurrencies.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPriceTi: UI stub for live price tick display, currently showing a placeholder alert.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorEnhanced.ts: Enhanced actor hook adding diagnostics, timeout detection, admin initialization tracking, and retry flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionRecovery: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state and creating an AuthClient instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, admin checks, roles, and live crypto market data using the backend actor and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and applying base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BackendTesterPage.tsx: UI page for running backend diagnostics, showing admin status, role info, and access-related details.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying watchlist tools and popular crypto cards, with optional navigation to backend tester.
frontend/src/utils/backendTesterCommands: Defines backend testing command metadata and execution logic, including parsers and category organization.
frontend/src/utils/coinGeckoMarketData.t: Parses CoinGecko API responses and formats price and market cap values for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and manage persisted parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, issues, and feature requirements, focusing on backend CoinGecko outcalls and frontend integration.
